prompts: Create a tiny, cute grass-type Pokemon with a bright yellow body and a small green leaf on top.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small sunflower, with a round shape and a cheerful expression.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of sunny days, with yellow petals and a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, featuring a plump body and playful characteristics.
Imagine a Pokemon that loves to bask in the sun, with vibrant colors and a simple yet adorable design.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a seedling, with bright colors and a small, smiling face.
Give me a Pokemon that represents growth and nature, with a charming appearance and a sunny personality.
